data.title: irani - English definition, grammar, pronunciation, synonyms and examples
data.meta_description: Learn the definition of 'irani'. Check out the pronunciation, synonyms and grammar. Browse the use examples 'irani' in the great English corpus.
data.text:
irani in English dictionary

Meanings and definitions of "irani"

relative to Iran and its people

a person from Iran or of Iranian heritage

adjective

relative to Iran and its people

noun

a person from Iran or of Iranian heritage

noun

A member of the smaller of the two Zoroastrian communities of the Indian subcontinent.

noun

a native or inhabitant of Iran; "the majority of Irani are Persian Shiite Muslims"

more

Synonyms of "irani" in English dictionary

Iranian, Persian are the top synonyms of "irani" in English thesaurus.

Iranian · Persian

a native or inhabitant of Iran; "the majority of Irani are Persian Shiite Muslims"
